document_data.name: ''Black Wolf Talisman''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''black wolf talisman''''' was a simple, [[magic]]al necklace associated with [[Kresselack]] the [[barbarian]] king.
document_data.Description: I looked to be a simple flat stone upon which was painted the likeness of a [[wolf]]'s paw.
document_data.Powers: Despite its simple appearance, the ''black wolf talisman'' possessed powerful magic that benefited the wearer. Anyone that hung the talisman around their neck felt a boost to their vitality, natural fortitude, and inherent resistance to extreme cold.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1281}}, the ''black wolf talisman'' could be found in the network of crypts and cairns within which Kresselack and his barbarian horde were interred.
